p: The experiments described in this study were carried out at the National Microbiology Laboratory (NML) as described in Animal Use Document H-15-029 and were approved by the Animal Care Committee located at the Canadian Science Center for Human and Animal Health, in accordance with the guidelines provided by the Canadian Council on Animal Care. All infectious work was performed inside the biosafety level 4 (BSL4) laboratory at the NML at the Public Health Agency of Canada.
